title: Eureka
brief_description: Highly commended entry into the “Make a stamp come alive” category of Screen It! This film recounts the story of famous revolt in Ballarat and the subsequent discovery of gold. An animated short entered to ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
